div.p: The official URL for this implementation guide is:
Example IG exercises many of the fields in a SUSHI configuration.

title.value: HL7 PT FHIR Implementation Guide: Example IG Release 1 | STU1

description.value: Example IG exercises many of the fields in a SUSHI configuration.

valueMarkdown.value: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology
Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on the HL7 Extension Pack

description.value: The details about the device when it is affixed or inside of a patient. - Extension created based on what exists in FHIR Version 5
The availability of the device - Extension created based on what exists in FHIR Version 5
Extension for birth place in Portugal
Devices may be associated with one or more categories. - Extension created based on what exists in FHIR Version 5
Billing code or reference associated with the device - Extension created based on what exists in FHIR Version 5

Extension to Condition Persistence in Portugal. This extension contains the perseverance of a problem (e.g., acute, chronic, etc.). It is necessary to create a table with codes for the correct mapping of this field, associating a system to it
Whether the report is about the current inventory count (snapshot) or a differential change in inventory (change).
[PT] Extension to give information about death
Extension to Diagnosis Priority in Portugal
Extension to indicate the type of diet of the patient
Extension indicating whether medication is provided or not
The name used to display by default when the device is referenced. - Extension created based on what exists in FHIR Version 5
Extension for Economic Insufficiency in Portugal
Extension to identify if the appointment will occur in extra scheduling
Information aimed at providing directions for the usage of this model of device - Extension created based on what exists in FHIR Version 5
An inventory listing section (grouped by any of the attributes).
Extension to indicate if the device is a backup for use, if there is no free device.
Extension created based on what exists in FHIR Version 5
Indicates where and when the device is available on the market - Extension created based on what exists in FHIR Version 5
Extension that indicates which participants may be part of the drug flow described in the form
Extension for nationality in Portugal
Extension in Portugal to indicate if the indicated language is the native language
A note associated with the InventoryReport.
Reason to not perform the plan, request, order, task or other action
The status of the device itself - whether it is switched on, or activated, etc. - Extension created based on what exists in FHIR Version 5
What type of operation is being performed - addition or subtraction.
The reason for this count - regular count, ad-hoc count, new arrivals, etc.
Information about the packaging of the device, i.e. how the device is packaged - Extension created based on what exists in FHIR Version 5
Extension to Procedure Priority in Portugal
Extension to indicate qualification proficiency in Portugal
Extension to parish in Portugal

A generic CodeSystem resource for Portugal. It can be used for masterfile situations of specialties.

Creation of the InventoryReport resource present in the R5 version of FHIR through the Basic resource
A generic Location resource for Portugal
A resource for MasterFile about Locations
This profile is still under analysis, so it should be used with caution.
A generic Medication resource for Portugal
A generic MedicationAdministration resource for Portugal
A generic MedicationDispense resource for Portugal
A generic MedicationKnowledge resource for Portugal

Resource to represent observation results produced by laboratory tests
Resource for representing observation results produced by diagnostic procedures
Resource for observation results related to vital signs
A generic OperationOutcome resource for Portugal
A generic Organization resource for Portugal
A generic Patient resource for Portugal

A generic PractitionerRole resource for Portugal

Extension created based on what exists in FHIR Version 5
Identifier associated with the regulatory documentation of a set of device models - Extension created based on what exists in FHIR Version 5
When the report has been submitted.
Who submits the report.
The period the report refers to.
Extension to indicate when the task should be performed - Extension created based on what exists in FHIR Version 5
Extension to inform whether it is necessary to send a label or not
Includes all codes from SNOMED CT
The status of the inventory check or notification - whether this is draft (e.g. the report is still pending some updates) or active.
Extension indicating when the state changed
Extension created based on what exists in FHIR Version 5
Extension created based on what exists in FHIR Version 5
Includes all codes from V2 0136
Possible values to be considered in the characteristics of patients in MedicationKnowledge
True or false indication
A set of ordered Quantity values defined by a low and high limit.
